spec_data.Name: cowsay
spec_data.Description:
cowsay is a configurable talking cow, written in Perl.  It operates
much as the figlet program does, and it written in the same spirit
of silliness.
It generates ASCII pictures of a cow with a message. It can also generate
pictures of other animals.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 20 Nov 2017 11:39:09 AM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
